title: New: Bayy – My Best Friend
body:
Blog come label, **Beech Coma** have a real knack for uncovering blurry, sun-drenched little gems.

_My Best Friend_ from Brighton’s **BAYY** is no exception, sporting lovely production, shoegaze sensibilities and bleary vocals. This band is sure to build momentum leading into the summer months.

**Beech Coma Vol. 1** can be pre-ordered [here](http://beechcoma.bandcamp.com/album/vol-1), featuring **BAYY**, **Paeris Giles** and **Sherbert **amongst others.

\[soundcloud url=”https://api.soundcloud.com/tracks/142377840″ params=”auto\_play=false&hide\_related=false&visual=true” width=”100%” height=”450″ iframe=”true” /\]
